Description: GPUs: Two NVIDIA® RTX™ A6000 (48 GB ECC GDDR6; 4 x DisplayPort 1.4, PCIe x16) Graphics with Blower Fan; or two Radeon Pro W6800X Duo with 64GB of GDDR6 memory each. The GPUs should be compatible with the CPUs. Memory: at least 768GB DDR4 (the memory volume and type needs to be compatible with the processors) Storage: at least 4TB SSD Monitors: three 4k or 2k monitors with eye-care technique, low blue light, non-flickering, above 100%sRGB OS: Windows preferred

Shared or Dedicated: Minimum of 3 units, possibly more depending on graduate student load.
